| icon           = poe2 daibo o osa icon.png
| description    = Ranging from clear to slightly cloudy white, this liquor is distilled from a mixture of two different rices (one short grain, the other long) in water from a mountain spring on the island of Osa. The strongest liquor native to the Deadfire, daibō is generally served warm and is particularly popular among the artisan caste.

* [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/): Sold by [Dawnstar Vendor](/dawnstarVendor/).
* [The Brass Citadel](/theBrassCitadel/): Sold by the [Lounge server](/loungeServer/) in the [Officer's Lounge](/officersLounge/).
* [Dunnage](/dunnage/), [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/): Sold by [Jacob Harker](/jacobHarker/).
* [Dunnage](/dunnage/), [Radiant Court](/radiantCourt/): Sold by [Rosanella](/rosanella/).
* [Crookspur](/crookspur/): In a crate in the northern part of the fortress exterior.
}}
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Drink}} in {{poe2}}, included as part of the [Rum Runner's Pack](/rumRunnersPack/).
